articles.description: Trans and non-binary players can decide for themselves which team to play for, in contrast to the actions of many sporting bodies in recent days who have reviewed their policy on transgender athletes.
articles.content:
German transgender footballers can 'independently' choose whether to play for a men's or women's team after new regulations were announced by the DFB.

articles.title: Transgender mountain biker Kate Weatherly slams 'horrifying' new rules on trans athletes - New York Post
articles.description: New Zealand racer Kate Weatherly, 24, spoke out while attacking new rules from the world swimming’s governing body, FINA, that would ban her from competing if also applied to mountain bikers.
articles.content: A transgender mountain biker who quickly dominated womens races after transitioning has said it is horrifying that new rules are banning trans athletes who are unfairly being accused of ruining women… [+2812 chars]

articles.title: Robert Lewandowski: Bayern Munich stars 'tired of his public posturing and expecting departure' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Lewandowski, 33, has confirmed his intention to leave Bayern this summer after eight years in Munich, with Barcelona, Paris Saint-Germain and Chelsea all vying for his signature.
articles.content:
Bayern Munich stars are reportedly bracing themselves for Robert Lewandowski's departure - having grown tired of his public posturing to force a move away from the club.
